original_text: Only be strong and very courageous, being careful to do according to all the law that Moses my servant commanded you. Do not turn from it to the right hand or to the left, that you may have good success wherever you go.
korean_text: 오직 강하고 극히 담대하여 나의 종 모세가 네게 명령한 그 율법을 다 지켜 행하고 우로나 좌로나 치우치지 말라 그리하면 어디로 가든지 형통하리니

sentences.original_text: Only be strong and very courageous,
being careful to do according to all the law
that Moses my servant commanded you.
Do not turn from it to the right hand or to the left,
that you may have good success
